item.title: Project 1: Predicting Credit Card Approvals
item.description: Predict the probability of future defaults and credit card borrowings using data submitted by applicants. Predict if an applicant is ‘good’ or ‘bad’ client Link to Github Repository

item.title: About
item.description: Data Science and Machine Learning are my passions. My name is Hidaya Regragui and I have been working in the data science field doing Marketing analytics for 2 years. I transitioned into data science from a software engineering background. I fell in love with data science and machine learning during my Phd research journey.
